long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,hr,zh_CN,zh_TW:
Pinterest Image & Video Downloader: Save Your Creative Inspiration with One Click

Enhanced Functionality
The browser extension now offers even greater functionality! In addition to downloading images, you can now effortlessly download your favorite video content as well.

Efficient Downloading Tool
Tired of saving images one by one? Pinterest Image & Video Downloader lets you download entire boards or curated lists of images and videos with just a single click. Say goodbye to tedious copying and pasting and blocked resources, and enjoy the convenience of efficient downloading!

Key Features:
* One-click download of entire pinboards and feeds, including images and videos
* Convenient sequential downloading for ease of use
* Lightweight and easy to use

Suitable for Everyone
Whether you're a designer creating mood boards, a blogger collecting inspirational content, or someone who simply wants to save their favorite Pinterest finds, this batch download extension is a valuable time-saving tool. Install it today and experience a faster, smarter way to download from Pinterest while keeping your activity completely private.

Privacy Focused
User privacy is our top priority. All downloads happen directly within your browser - no images or data are ever sent to remote servers, ensuring your activity remains completely confidential.

Disclaimer
This extension is an independently developed product by ExtensionsBox and has no affiliation with Pinterest.
